title: Figure Secures $675 Million Funding from Tech Giants for Humanoid Robots
description: Figure, a robotics startup based in Sunnyvale, has recently unveiled a significant milestone in its quest to transform the robotics sector. Securing an impressive $675 million in venture capital funding, the company has gained substantial backing from prominent tech titans such as OpenAI, Jeff Bezos, Nvidia, Microsoft, and Intel’s startup-funding arms.
